data.text:
Gilmore Girls is one of my FAVOURITE TV shows ever! And I love that Rory is a voracious reader. These are (hopefully) all the books which were referenced in the show. I intend to read them all. üôÇ

Well, some of them I‚Äôve read already. Should I reread? Meh, I don‚Äôt want to reread The God of Small Things. But LOTR! I‚Äôll decide later.

Books in bold have been read prior to starting this blog.

‚ÄúI live in two worlds. One is a world of books. I‚Äôve been a resident of Faulkner‚Äôs Yoknapatawpha County, hunted the white whale aboard the Pequod, fought alongside Napoleon, sailed a raft with Huck and Jim, committed absurdities with Ignatius J. Reilly, rode a sad train with Anna Karenina and strolled down Swann‚Äôs Way.‚Äù

‚Äî Rory Gilmore
